contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 5, 2017 D Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest (Section A)
Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest (Section A) 200 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest annual-open-brass-band-contest
None
Town Hall, Dewsbury, West Yorkshire Section placings determined by points awarded for Test Piece. Overall Winner determined by combined points awarded for Test Piece plus Hymn.
Overall Winner: Wm H Birch Cup and Services of a Geneva Artiste ___Skelmanthorpe_____________ Winning Conductor: Fred H Bradbury Cup _Jim Davies, Skelmanthorpe___________ Best Instrumentalist: YHBBA Glass Trophy ___Euphonium, Skelmanthorpe_____ Best Hymn: John Taylor Memorial Cup __Skelmanthorpe______________ Best Championship Section Band Sam Woodhouse Trophy + £200 ____ York Railway Institute_________________ Best First Section Band: William Rowntree Rose Bowl + £200 __Skelmanthorpe_____________________ Runner-up First Section Ernest Dobson Cup + £100 ___South Yorkshire Police_______________________ Best Second Section Band: Alfred Whitehead Memorial Cup + £200 ____Blackpool Brass_________________ Runner-up Second Section British Steel Cup + £100 ______Marple_______________________________ Newmoon Insurance award to band playing No. 1 (£25) ___ Skelmanthorpe___
Jan. 17, 2017, 2:58 p.m. Nov. 6, 2017, 1:42 p.m.
1 Skelmanthorpe Band Jim Davies
2 Blackpool Brass John Pearson
3 South Yorkshire Police Band Jack Capstaff
4 Skelmanthorpe Prospect Brass Unknown
4 York Railway Institute Unknown
4 Durham Miners Association Stuart Gray
